content: materials - #10 cotton thread - drawstring stopper optional gauge not critical but mine is 4 double_crochet & 4 chain 2 spaces = 2 inches my bag is about 10 inches across at it s widest and 8 inches long notes this bag will be worked in the round without joining until the last round you may use a stitch marker at the beginning of the rounds if you want but i just marked the beginning side of the bag
